content.text: 这一部分展示了规划导师与你沟通交流以后为你制定的申请意向专业方向、申请国家、申请形象、学术主线、个人特色副线。申请形象指的是
你的申请材料希望给招生官展现你是怎样一个人，在一些可量化可直接对比的成绩成就奖项等硬件之外，还能体现你怎样的个性、品质、故
事、特点、兴趣和热情，往往这些软性的东西更能让招生官对你印象深刻。学术主线是申请意向专业方向的展开和细化，个人特色副线则是在
学术主线之外你的第二主要特点，有可能是另一个有一定联系或一定反差的学术线，也有可能是非学术的例如户外冒险、艺术音乐、某种理念
追求、某个方面的社会关怀等等。学术主线和个人特色副线共同塑造一个更为立体、更为多元、更有区分度的申请形象，使你从同专业方向的

structured.text: 这一部分展示了规划导师与你沟通交流以后为你制定的申请意向专业方向、申请国家、申请形象、学术主线、个人特色副线。申请形象指的是你的申请材料希望给招生官展现你是怎样一个人，在一些可量化可直接对比的成绩成就奖项等硬件之外，还能体现你怎样的个性、品质、故事、特点、兴趣和热情，往往这些软性的东西更能让招生官对你印象深刻。学术主线是申请意向专业方向的展开和细化，个人特色副线则是在学术主线之外你的第二主要特点，有可能是另一个有一定联系或一定反差的学术线，也有可能是非学术的例如户外冒险、艺术音乐、某种理念追求、某个方面的社会关怀等等。学术主线和个人特色副线共同塑造一个更为立体、更为多元、更有区分度的申请形象，使你从同专业方向的申请者中脱颖而出。
公共卫生学／全球健康 生物学

content.text: 这一部分记录了你9-12年级完整的在校成绩情况。在校成绩是招生官对你学术能力判断的基础指标，好的在校成绩是申请顶尖大学的基本门
槛。另外在校选课应体现与申请意向专业方向相一致或相关联的学术兴趣。
北京师范大学附属实验中学中学

structured.text: 这一部分记录了你9-12年级完整的在校成绩情况。在校成绩是招生官对你学术能力判断的基础指标，好的在校成绩是申请顶尖大学的基本门槛。另外在校选课应体现与申请意向专业方向相一致或相关联的学术兴趣。

content.text: 这一部分记录了你已经取得的各项标化考试成绩以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的的未来标化考试计划。标化考试成绩是在校成绩之
外的又一重要学术实力评判标准，顾名思义，它的意义在于更为标准化，不同学校的在校成绩往往很难比较，标化考试成绩弥补了这一点，于
是也是很被招生官看重的。另外一些所在高中并不知名的学生可以通过标化考试进一步证明自己的学术能力基本面。

structured.text: 这一部分记录了你已经参加的夏校、以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的正在申请中或计划要申请的夏校。参加夏校可以帮助你在专业方向上提前进行大学水平的学习，其中含金量较高的夏校在大学申请时作用有时类似于学术类奖项，能够进一步证明进阶学术实力，并且可以通过夏校争取教授推荐信。另外上过某个大学的夏校也可以证明对该校的入读兴趣，对一些大学来说，这种情况下再选择ED申请该校会有加成。

Program for students who are looking for creative writing workshops, preview courses in STEM fields, or to explore theories of ethics, philosophy, and free expression. Students who have completed a UChicago residential or online UChicago Pre-College Summer Session program are eligible to apply to UChicago through binding UChicago Summer Student Early Notification option under the Early Decision I plan. 2025 courses in programs as follows:-Biology: Biology and its Modern Applications, Biomolecules of Life, Biotechnology for the 21st Century, Infectious Agents & Diseases, Explorations in Neuroscience of Neurons&Behavior&Beyond; Mathematical and Computational Research in Biological Sciences; -Examining Culture and Society(NEW Area of Interest): How societies Work or Don't, Global Challenges, Mind and Reality, What is Truth; -Economics/Business: Economics From an Experimental Perspective, Pathways in Economics, Intro to Macroeconomic Models(NEW), The Age of Capital: Freedom and Crisis(NEW); -Psychology/Human Body: Developmental Psychology,Fundamentals of Psychology-Hummanities: Cinema&Media&Society/Global Survey, Creative writing, Religion and Unbelief -Law and Politics: Human Rights of Foundational Concepts, Legal Reasoning and Institutions, Pathways in World Politics, Quantitative Evaluation for Public Policy, The Theory and Politics of Capitalism; -Math and Computer Science: Intro to Creative Coding, Pathways in Data Science, Proof-based Discrete Mathematics, Understanding Al in Challenges/Changes/How We Communicate -Physical Sciences: Gravitation to levitation/Physics from Supernova to Superconductor, Pathways in Molecular Engineering, Physics of Stars, Think Like a Physicist/The Physics Problem Solver's Toolkit; -Philosophy: Intro to the Philosophy of Love, The Philosophy of Life and Death, The World of Greek Philosophy;

参加年级 筹备时间
2026.01.01-2026.03.31		 参加时间
申请截止日期 难度
■高难度N1		 重要性
★★

The Research Mentorship Program is a competitive, six-week summer program that engages qualified, high-achieving high school students from all over the world in interdisciplinary, hands-on, university-level research. Students will be paired up wvith a mentor (graduate student, postdoc, or faculty) and choose a research project from a large list of disciplines offered by the program each year.Research areas include but are not limited to: Anthropology, Earth Science,Geography,Music, Biochemistry, Ecology, Global Studies, Neuroscience, Biology, Economics, History, Physics, Chemistry, Education, Marine Biology, Psychology, Chicana/o Studies, Engineering, Mathematics, Sociology, Computer Science, Environmental Policy, Media & Arts & Tech, Statistics. Outstanding rising sophomores/current 9th graders will be accepted on a case-by-case basis.

Summer Scholars participants ondtwinton                 -domic programs of study.The coursework is a true preview of college academics-it is both rigorous and rewarding, and students earn one transferable college credit upon the completion of a program track. Students collaborate on coursework outside designated class times as they would in anycollege setting. 2025 study areas/topics as follows: Accounting, Archaeology, Christianity and the World Religions, Climate Change, Confronting Poverty, Creativity in Age of Artificial Intelligence, Engineering and Inventing the Future, Entrepreneurial Immersion（新增）,Exploring the World of Chemistry, Film Production, Gender and Culture in American, History, Global Health, Identity & Popular Culture, Data Visualization and Storytelling, Philosophy, Law, Life sciences（新增）,Journalism, Marketing for the Common Good，Neuroscience,Object Design and Prototyping, Photography, Psychology and the Self, Public Policy Making, Public Speaking and Debate, Research Computing, Restorative Justice, Teens and Screens, World Politics and Power/International Relations.

Summer Academies at Penn are intensive, three-week programs that combine hands-on application with scientific theory. Students participating in these Summer Academies can choose from a variety of science-themed research programs,then spend the summer using Penn's cutting-edge technology, participating in innovative lab experiences, and learning from some of the best Ivy League professors and researchers in the country. 2025 Summer Academies including:-Biomedical Research,-Chemistry Research, -Experimental Physics Research, -Global Culture and Media, -Neuroscience Research, -Social Justice Research

参加年级 筹备时间 参加时间
申请截止日期 难度 重要性
2026.03.01 ■中难度

the summer using Penn's cutting-edge technology, participating in innovative lab experiences, and learning from some of the best
Ivy League professors and researchers in the country. 2025 Summer Academies including:-Biomedical Research,-Chemistry
Research, -Experimental Physics Research, -Global Culture and Media, -Neuroscience Research, -Social Justice Research

03 申请规划概述 Overview of Application Planning

这一部分展示了规划导师与你沟通交流以后为你制定的申请意向专业方向、申请国家、申请形象、学术主线、个人特色副线。申请形象指的是你的申请材料希望给招生官展现你是怎样一个人，在一些可量化可直接对比的成绩成就奖项等硬件之外，还能体现你怎样的个性、品质、故事、特点、兴趣和热情，往往这些软性的东西更能让招生官对你印象深刻。学术主线是申请意向专业方向的展开和细化，个人特色副线则是在学术主线之外你的第二主要特点，有可能是另一个有一定联系或一定反差的学术线，也有可能是非学术的例如户外冒险、艺术音乐、某种理念追求、某个方面的社会关怀等等。学术主线和个人特色副线共同塑造一个更为立体、更为多元、更有区分度的申请形象，使你从同专业方向的申请者中脱颖而出。
公共卫生学／全球健康 生物学
这一部分记录了你9-12年级完整的在校成绩情况。在校成绩是招生官对你学术能力判断的基础指标，好的在校成绩是申请顶尖大学的基本门槛。另外在校选课应体现与申请意向专业方向相一致或相关联的学术兴趣。
**北京师范大学附属实验中学中学**
这一部分记录了你已经取得的各项标化考试成绩以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的的未来标化考试计划。标化考试成绩是在校成绩之外的又一重要学术实力评判标准，顾名思义，它的意义在于更为标准化，不同学校的在校成绩往往很难比较，标化考试成绩弥补了这一点，于是也是很被招生官看重的。另外一些所在高中并不知名的学生可以通过标化考试进一步证明自己的学术能力基本面。

- 已有标化分数

这一部分记录了你已经完成的课外活动、正在进行的课外活动、以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的下一步课外活动计划。课外活动是体现软实力的重要阵地，通过合理的规划，我们希望通过课外活动有重点、有层次、有细节、有亮点、生动全面地体现你的申请形象、学术主线、个人特色副线。将来在大学网申中你的活动细节无法在有限的迁动石述完签中体现的／们也会考虑通过额外信息部分加以展开和展示。）

将科研知识落地，体现人文关怀和帮助
这一部分记录了你已经参加的夏校、以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的正在申请中或计划要申请的夏校。参加夏校可以帮助你在专业方向上提前进行大学水平的学习，其中含金量较高的夏校在大学申请时作用有时类似于学术类奖项，能够进一步证明进阶学术实力，并且可以通过夏校争取教授推荐信。另外上过某个大学的夏校也可以证明对该校的入读兴趣，对一些大学来说，这种情况下再选择ED申请该校会有加成。

Program for students who are looking for creative writing workshops, preview courses in STEM fields, or to explore theories of ethics, philosophy, and free expression. Students who have completed a UChicago residential or online UChicago Pre-College Summer Session program are eligible to apply to UChicago through binding UChicago Summer Student Early Notification option under the Early Decision I plan. 2025 courses in programs as follows:-Biology: Biology and its Modern Applications, Biomolecules of Life, Biotechnology for the 21st Century, Infectious Agents & Diseases, Explorations in Neuroscience of Neurons&Behavior&Beyond; Mathematical and Computational Research in Biological Sciences; -Examining Culture and Society(NEW Area of Interest): How societies Work or Don't, Global Challenges, Mind and Reality, What is Truth; -Economics/Business: Economics From an Experimental Perspective, Pathways in Economics, Intro to Macroeconomic Models(NEW), The Age of Capital: Freedom and Crisis(NEW); -Psychology/Human Body: Developmental Psychology,Fundamentals of Psychology-Hummanities: Cinema&Media&Society/Global Survey, Creative writing, Religion and Unbelief -Law and Politics: Human Rights of Foundational Concepts, Legal Reasoning and Institutions, Pathways in World Politics, Quantitative Evaluation for Public Policy, The Theory and Politics of Capitalism; -Math and Computer Science: Intro to Creative Coding, Pathways in Data Science, Proof-based Discrete Mathematics, Understanding Al in Challenges/Changes/How We Communicate -Physical Sciences: Gravitation to levitation/Physics from Supernova to Superconductor, Pathways in Molecular Engineering, Physics of Stars, Think Like a Physicist/The Physics Problem Solver's Toolkit; -Philosophy: Intro to the Philosophy of Love, The Philosophy of Life and Death, The World of Greek Philosophy;

参加年级 筹备时间
2026.01.01-2026.03.31		 参加时间
申请截止日期 难度
■高难度N1		 重要性
★★

The Research Mentorship Program is a competitive, six-week summer program that engages qualified, high-achieving high school students from all over the world in interdisciplinary, hands-on, university-level research. Students will be paired up wvith a mentor (graduate student, postdoc, or faculty) and choose a research project from a large list of disciplines offered by the program each year.Research areas include but are not limited to: Anthropology, Earth Science,Geography,Music, Biochemistry, Ecology, Global Studies, Neuroscience, Biology, Economics, History, Physics, Chemistry, Education, Marine Biology, Psychology, Chicana/o Studies, Engineering, Mathematics, Sociology, Computer Science, Environmental Policy, Media & Arts & Tech, Statistics. Outstanding rising sophomores/current 9th graders will be accepted on a case-by-case basis.

Summer Scholars participants ondtwinton -domic programs of study.The coursework is a true preview of college academics-it is both rigorous and rewarding, and students earn one transferable college credit upon the completion of a program track. Students collaborate on coursework outside designated class times as they would in anycollege setting. 2025 study areas/topics as follows: Accounting, Archaeology, Christianity and the World Religions, Climate Change, Confronting Poverty, Creativity in Age of Artificial Intelligence, Engineering and Inventing the Future, Entrepreneurial Immersion（新增）,Exploring the World of Chemistry, Film Production, Gender and Culture in American, History, Global Health, Identity & Popular Culture, Data Visualization and Storytelling, Philosophy, Law, Life sciences（新增）,Journalism, Marketing for the Common Good，Neuroscience,Object Design and Prototyping, Photography, Psychology and the Self, Public Policy Making, Public Speaking and Debate, Research Computing, Restorative Justice, Teens and Screens, World Politics and Power/International Relations.

Summer Academies at Penn are intensive, three-week programs that combine hands-on application with scientific theory. Students participating in these Summer Academies can choose from a variety of science-themed research programs,then spend the summer using Penn's cutting-edge technology, participating in innovative lab experiences, and learning from some of the best Ivy League professors and researchers in the country. 2025 Summer Academies including:-Biomedical Research,-Chemistry Research, -Experimental Physics Research, -Global Culture and Media, -Neuroscience Research, -Social Justice Research

参加年级 筹备时间 参加时间
申请截止日期 难度 重要性

![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/ac1bc21b96af9abf.jpg) # 远期待办 ·AP学校正常推进，寒假可以考虑进行模考查漏补缺 ·持续专业相关文献的阅读 ·后续考虑建一个bioethics，或者medical humanities方向的社团 这一部分展示了规划导师与你沟通交流以后为你制定的申请意向专业方向、申请国家、申请形象、学术主线、个人特色副线。申请形象指的是你的申请材料希望给招生官展现你是怎样一个人，在一些可量化可直接对比的成绩成就奖项等硬件之外，还能体现你怎样的个性、品质、故事、特点、兴趣和热情，往往这些软性的东西更能让招生官对你印象深刻。学术主线是申请意向专业方向的展开和细化，个人特色副线则是在学术主线之外你的第二主要特点，有可能是另一个有一定联系或一定反差的学术线，也有可能是非学术的例如户外冒险、艺术音乐、某种理念追求、某个方面的社会关怀等等。学术主线和个人特色副线共同塑造一个更为立体、更为多元、更有区分度的申请形象，使你从同专业方向的申请者中脱颖而出。 # ·申请方向 **·申请地区** ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/6c1221e080ca526c.jpg) ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/e8ae3b1ffe538de4.jpg) 这一部分记录了你9-12年级完整的在校成绩情况。在校成绩是招生官对你学术能力判断的基础指标，好的在校成绩是申请顶尖大学的基本门槛。另外在校选课应体现与申请意向专业方向相一致或相关联的学术兴趣。 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/dbb0ede1a3add852.jpg) # 在校成绩记录 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/c6eb90fd5cdeb9f6.jpg) **北京师范大学附属实验中学中学** 10/11年级； 2025.10.29 18:18 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/45158fe0e618551e.jpg) ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/88ce9eaae375909f.jpg) 这一部分记录了你已经取得的各项标化考试成绩以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的的未来标化考试计划。标化考试成绩是在校成绩之外的又一重要学术实力评判标准，顾名思义，它的意义在于更为标准化，不同学校的在校成绩往往很难比较，标化考试成绩弥补了这一点，于是也是很被招生官看重的。另外一些所在高中并不知名的学生可以通过标化考试进一步证明自己的学术能力基本面。

活动描述 规划理由 将科研知识落地，体现人文关怀和帮助 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/c7c9677c295d3a40.jpg) ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/5bbff9808c401438.jpg) **夏校** **Summer School** ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/fd4de48df28b8787.jpg) 这一部分记录了你已经参加的夏校、以及规划导师与你沟通交流以后一起制定的正在申请中或计划要申请的夏校。参加夏校可以帮助你在专业方向上提前进行大学水平的学习，其中含金量较高的夏校在大学申请时作用有时类似于学术类奖项，能够进一步证明进阶学术实力，并且可以通过夏校争取教授推荐信。另外上过某个大学的夏校也可以证明对该校的入读兴趣，对一些大学来说，这种情况下再选择ED申请该校会有加成。 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/b28e4a645c622245.jpg) # 计划申请夏校 # | UChicago Immersion Program # 夏校介绍 Program for students who are looking for creative writing workshops, preview courses in STEM fields, or to explore theories of ethics, philosophy, and free expression. Students who have completed a UChicago residential or online UChicago Pre-College Summer Session program are eligible to apply to UChicago through binding UChicago Summer Student Early Notification option under the Early Decision I plan. 2025 courses in programs as follows:-Biology: Biology and its Modern Applications, Biomolecules of Life, Biotechnology for the 21st Century, Infectious Agents & Diseases, Explorations in Neuroscience of Neurons&Behavior&Beyond; Mathematical and Computational Research in Biological Sciences; -Examining Culture and Society(NEW Area of Interest): How societies Work or Don't, Global Challenges, Mind and Reality, What is Truth; -Economics/Business: Economics From an Experimental Perspective, Pathways in Economics, Intro to Macroeconomic Models(NEW), The Age of Capital: Freedom and Crisis(NEW); -Psychology/Human Body: Developmental Psychology,Fundamentals of Psychology-Hummanities: Cinema&Media&Society/Global Survey, Creative writing, Religion and Unbelief -Law and Politics: Human Rights of Foundational Concepts, Legal Reasoning and Institutions, Pathways in World Politics, Quantitative Evaluation for Public Policy, The Theory and Politics of Capitalism; -Math and Computer Science: Intro to Creative Coding, Pathways in Data Science, Proof-based Discrete Mathematics, Understanding Al in Challenges/Changes/How We Communicate -Physical Sciences: Gravitation to levitation/Physics from Supernova to Superconductor, Pathways in Molecular Engineering, Physics of Stars, Think Like a Physicist/The Physics Problem Solver's Toolkit; -Philosophy: Intro to the Philosophy of Love, The Philosophy of Life and Death, The World of Greek Philosophy;

夏校描述 规划理由 # UCSB Research Mentorship Program 夏校介绍 The Research Mentorship Program is a competitive, six-week summer program that engages qualified, high-achieving high school students from all over the world in interdisciplinary, hands-on, university-level research. Students will be paired up wvith a mentor (graduate student, postdoc, or faculty) and choose a research project from a large list of disciplines offered by the program each year.Research areas include but are not limited to: Anthropology, Earth Science,Geography,Music, Biochemistry, Ecology, Global Studies, Neuroscience, Biology, Economics, History, Physics, Chemistry, Education, Marine Biology, Psychology, Chicana/o Studies, Engineering, Mathematics, Sociology, Computer Science, Environmental Policy, Media & Arts & Tech, Statistics. Outstanding rising sophomores/current 9th graders will be accepted on a case-by-case basis. 参加年级 筹备时间 参加时间 2025.12.01-2026.03.31 申请截止日期 难度 重要性 2026.03.01 ■高难度 ![](https://web-api.textin.com/ocr_image/external/efab72a1ed448f4d.jpg) 夏校描述 规划理由 ## Notre Dame Summer Scholars # 夏校介绍 Summer Scholars participants ondtwinton -domic programs of study.The coursework is a true preview of college academics-it is both rigorous and rewarding, and students earn one transferable college credit upon the completion of a program track. Students collaborate on coursework outside designated class times as they would in anycollege setting. 2025 study areas/topics as follows: Accounting, Archaeology, Christianity and the World Religions, Climate Change, Confronting Poverty, Creativity in Age of Artificial Intelligence, Engineering and Inventing the Future, Entrepreneurial Immersion（新增）,Exploring the World of Chemistry, Film Production, Gender and Culture in American, History, Global Health, Identity & Popular Culture, Data Visualization and Storytelling, Philosophy, Law, Life sciences（新增）,Journalism, Marketing for the Common Good，Neuroscience,Object Design and Prototyping, Photography, Psychology and the Self, Public Policy Making, Public Speaking and Debate, Research Computing, Restorative Justice, Teens and Screens, World Politics and Power/International Relations. 参加年级 筹备时间 参加时间 申请截止日期 难度 重要性 2026.02.18 ■中难度 ★★★ 夏校描述 规划理由 # | UPenn Summer Programs: Summer Academies # 夏校介绍 Summer Academies at Penn are intensive, three-week programs that combine hands-on application with scientific theory. Students participating in these Summer Academies can choose from a variety of science-themed research programs,then spend the summer using Penn's cutting-edge technology, participating in innovative lab experiences, and learning from some of the best Ivy League professors and researchers in the country. 2025 Summer Academies including:-Biomedical Research,-Chemistry Research, -Experimental Physics Research, -Global Culture and Media, -Neuroscience Research, -Social Justice Research
